abstract: Anheuser-Busch InBev said Friday that it had reached an agreement in principle to resolve the United States government’s antitrust concerns over the beer maker’s planned $20.1 billion deal with Grupo Modelo, the maker of Corona beer and other brands.

headline.main: Anheuser-Busch Merger Deal Clears an Antitrust Hurdle
headline.print_headline: Anheuser-Busch Merger Deal Clears an Antitrust Hurdle

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
